story.title: Our Story
story.intro: Two brothers with a shared passion for metalwork, transforming raw materials into functional art since 2011.
story.content1: SteelNovo was founded by brothers Omar and Davide Guerini, who grew up working alongside their father, an expert blacksmith, who passed down the passion for metal forging. What began as a childhood fascination has evolved into a lifelong passion, leading them to establish their own blacksmithing business after years of apprenticeship and professional training.
story.content2: We combine traditional ironworking techniques with modern technology to create unique, durable, and beautiful pieces that tell a story and stand the test of time.

philosophy.title: Our Craft Philosophy
philosophy.intro: We believe in the timeless value of handcrafted quality. Each piece we create embodies three core principles:

principles.craftsmanship: Craftsmanship: We dedicate the time and attention necessary to create pieces of exceptional quality, with impeccable joinery and finishing.
principles.functionality: Functionality: Beyond beauty, our work serves a purpose, designed to function flawlessly for generations.
principles.individuality: Individuality: No two pieces are identical. Each creation bears the distinctive marks of handcrafted work and is tailored to our clients' specific needs.

omar.bio: With a background in fine arts and 15 years of blacksmithing experience, Michael specializes in sculptural and decorative elements. His eye for design brings artistic vision to each project.

davide.bio: A mechanical engineer by training, David focuses on structural integrity and functional components. His technical expertise ensures that every piece is as durable as it is beautiful.

workshop.title: Our Workshop
workshop.description: Located just outside Portland, our forge combines traditional blacksmith tools with modern equipment. We welcome visitors by appointment to discuss projects and witness the crafting process firsthand.
